      • lookupGuidField

        public static JSONObject lookupGuidField(String domainName,
                                         String fieldName,
                                         ArrayList<String> fieldNames,
                                         ClientRequestHandlerInterface handler)
        Lookup the field or fields in the guid. Returns a JSONObject containing the fields and values or null if the domainName doesn't exist.
        Parameters:
        domainName - - the HRN of the guid
        fieldName - - the field to lookup (mutually exclusive with fieldNames)
        fieldNames - - the fields to lookup (mutually exclusive with fieldNames)
        handler -
        Returns:
        a JSONObject containing the fields and values or null

      • querytoStringForGNS

        public static String querytoStringForGNS(byte[] qname)
        Creates a string out of raw bytes[] from qname section of the DNS query message. This routine, when used, adds '.' at the end for using it for GNS lookups.
        Parameters:
        qname -
        Returns:
        questionString
